metadata.title: CVE-2018-11206

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for HPC 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for HPC 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP3

metadata.description: An out of bounds read was discovered in H5O_fill_new_decode and H5O_fill_old_decode in H5Ofill.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It could allow a remote denial of service or information disclosure attack.
